Oxnard.Buena High School (California):
Buena High School is part of the Ventura Unified School District and serves most of the eastern portion of Ventura, California.


== Girls Basketball ==
Buena High School girls basketball team is the most successful team in both wins and winning percentage in California History. Joe Vaughan created a basketball culture in the city of Ventura leading Buena to a record of 765–112 during his tenure at Buena, most in California along with best winning percentage.
